Html:
Hi.

Is there a method that

I can cache the data to local file  

from TILE(144, 79) to TILE(145, 80)?

 

Thx.

hqlgree2
check tilePrefetcher source, all you need to do is select area and click 'prefetch' in demos

radioman wrote:

check tilePrefetcher source, all you need to do is select area and click 'prefetch' in demos

Thx. 

I got what I need.

Last night I got one 96.1MB.

& now I got one 2.31MB.

Thx.

^_^
it's big by default, because it preallocate space ahead, you can use http://www.yunqa.de/delphi/doku.php/products/sqlitespy/index to optimize(remove unused space) before using it somewhere else..
